page.title: 16A talk with some of our mums
page.content: On Saturday my mum normally has a long lie in bed. Dad some times does too, but very often he gets up and makes the breakfast.When my mum eventually gets up she does some of the little jobs round the house that need doing then she makes lunch. We have a light lunch on Saturdays. In the afternoon mum sometimes taks us out with dad but most times we just stay at home.Mum and dad enjoy playing with us in the garden and they also take us for walks. there are some lovely walks along the banks of the River Eden.Mum loves gardening, she is always doing something like weeding or sowing seeds or just poking about. In the middle of the week mum goes to "Keep Fit."At the weekend she sometimes goes out for a meal or a drink or goes to a party with my dad.
